Attribute.Name: ItemID
Attribute.Description: Unique identifier for an item that belongs to a catalog organization.

Attribute.Name: OrganizationCode
Attribute.Description: Organization code whose product information is being stored.

Attribute.Name: UnitOfMeasure
Attribute.Description: Unit of measure for Item quantity.

Attribute.Name: Name
Attribute.Description: XML name of the unique identifier attribute.

Attribute.Name: Value
Attribute.Description: Value of the unique identifier attribute.

Attribute.Name: Name
Attribute.Description: XML name of the unique identifier attribute.

Attribute.Name: Value
Attribute.Description: Value of the unique identifier attribute.
